q: What is the Zomato Partner Program?
a: It allows you to list your restaurant on Zomato, accept online orders, and grow your business.
Listing is free! We only charge a commission (18-25%) on orders you receive.
Yes, Zomato has a huge fleet of delivery partners who pick up and drop off the food.
You need your FSSAI license, GST number, PAN card, and bank details.
